choices: I want to vore the Jonas Brothers!
1.content:
The only real rule is that the prey can't grow and you can't shrink. Also, add as much detail and drawn out eating as possible. (prepare your food, and savor the flavor!)

You have been given a new shrink gun, and are now loose, seeking the most succulent prey. Choose who they are wisely.
1.title: To start

11.content: After you stalk and catch your prey... after you prepare them and they sit upon your elegant table, how will you eat the three?
11.title: Decisons

111.content: Well, now, i guess we need to decide who will become which part of today's menu, no wont we....
111.title: Breakfast, lunch, dinner

12.content:
Mmm... those Gotti boys sure do look tasty. Let's turn these 'three plump little pigs' into 'Italian sausages', because we all love Italian food. : ) Prepare and eat them however you want, because YOU are in control.

However, after you stalk and catch your prey... after you prepare them and they sit upon your elegant table, how will you eat the three?
12.title: How to...

info.brief_description: create your own vore story with the jonas brother or the gotti boys... mmm, Italian food.
info.description: You have abrand new shrink gun and you are loose in the hosue of either the Jonas Brothers or Gotti boys. track down your prey, capture them, play with them, taunt them, prepare them and cook them.
